name: jirnee-Share
author: Rajiv Shrestha

sections.description: Help your visitor promote your travel site! The Jirnee- Travel Share bookmarking Widget allows any visitor to bookmark your travel site easily with Facebook as the current service (with the goal to add more services shortly). Sign up for a Jirnee.com account to see how your visitors are sharing your travel content, which destination is shared the most, and more. It’s all free–even the pretty charts and graphs.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Unzip the folder jirneeshare.zip
  2. Upload jirneeshare.php, ‘idg_admin.php’ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Under the settings you will find jirnee-settings where you can enter the API key to activate the plugin.
  5. Go to www.jirnee.com and signup to find the api key
sections.faq:
How do I add the api /consumer key ?

Click on the jirnee settings under the plugin where you can see the api key & consumer key to be entered .

Enter those key that you have obtained after you have signed up from www.jirnee.com/signup and click submit
Your plugin should be activated!

Where should I mail for support issues ?

support@jirnee.com
